title: Audio and Sound Issues
description: Fix no sound, microphone, and speaker problems.

steps.title: Check Volume and Mute
steps.instruction: Ensure volume is turned up and not muted. Check both system volume and application volume.

steps.title: Select Correct Output Device
steps.instruction: Windows: Right-click speaker icon → Sound Settings → Choose correct output device. Mac: System Preferences → Sound → Output.

steps.title: Test with Different Application
steps.instruction: Try playing sound in a different app (YouTube, music player) to isolate if it's app-specific.

steps.title: Update Audio Drivers
steps.instruction: Windows: Device Manager → Sound, video and game controllers → Right-click audio device → Update Driver.

steps.title: Restart Audio Service
steps.instruction: Windows: Services (services.msc) → Windows Audio → Restart. Or restart your computer.
